snippet: In an aftermath different from those in previous attacks, ordinary citizens and political opposition leaders after the Nice episode questioned whether enough had been done to protect the country....
abstract: Grim realization of vulnerability to terrorism settles over France in aftermath of Nice attack, leading to public criticism of leadership that stand in contrast to solidarity that followed attacks in Paris.

byline.contributor: Dan Bilefsky contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: In an aftermath different from those in previous attacks, ordinary citizens and political opposition leaders after the Nice episode questioned whether enough had been done to protect the country.

headline.main: In France, the Mood Darkens as a Harsh Reality Sets In
headline.print_headline: In France, the Mood Darkens as a Harsh Reality on Terrorism Sets In
